T02D1820:258b-3: rdo rje sems dpa' mchod pa'i chog / dpa' rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1820:258b-4: ri bong 'dzin 'od ltar dkar reg bya rdo rje mas 'khyud sku //
T02D1820:258b-5: mnyam med yon tan gter gyur sangs rgyas lnga yi gtsor gyur pa //
T02D1820:258b-6: ma rig mun pa'i tshogs kun ma lus kun nas bcom pa yis //
T02D1820:258b-7: phyag na rdo rje nam mkha'i mthar thug ji srid
T02D1820:258b-8: rgyal gyur cig / mdor bsdus rim las gsungs don
T02D1820:258b-9: rtogs dka' ba ; / byis pa rnams kyis rtogs par bya ba'i phyir //
T02D1820:258b-10: rdo rje sems mchod cho ga nus pa bzhin //
T02D1820:258b-11: bla ma'i lung las cho ga bzhin bshad bya //
T02D1820:258b-12: 'dir rdo rje sems dpa' mchod pa'i cho ga la
T02D1820:258b-13: dbang pa'i rnal 'byor pas dang por mal nas langs
T02D1820:258b-14: nas snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i
T02D1820:258b-15: h'um gi 'od zer gyis bdag nyid dri ma med
T02D1820:258b-16: par byas la / aom a'a: h'um badzra satva zhes
T02D1820:258b-17: bya ba rjes su dran pas sgo rnams sbyang ba
T02D1820:258b-18: la sogs pa dam pa'i spyod pa rjes su bskyang
T02D1820:258b-19: par bya ba rnams byas la /
T02D1820:258b-20: mchod pa'i yo byad rnams bsags nas mchod pa'i khang
T02D1820:258b-21: par zhugs la stan bde ba la gnas te rang
T02D1820:258b-22: gi lag mthil gnyis su aa las byung pa'i zla
T02D1820:258b-23: ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du h'um las byung ba'i
T02D1820:258b-25: aom shuddha dharma t'a siddha badzra h'um zhes brjod pas byin gyis brlab bo //
T02D1820:258b-26: de nas lkog ma'i phyogs su hr'i: las byung ba'i
T02D1820:258b-27: padma la h'um las gyur pa'i rdo rje bsams la
T02D1820:258b-28: / badzra dzi hva bhe h'um zhes bya bas byin gyis brlabs te /
T02D1820:258b-29: mchod yon gyi snod du me tog dang 'bru dang ldan pa'i chus bkang la /
T02D1820:258b-30: aom a'a: bigh'a nta kri ta h'um zhes bya ba
T02D1820:258b-31: lan bdun bzlas pa mdun du bzhag nas lag pa
T02D1820:258b-32: thal mo sbyar te rdo rje 'dzin pa blos dmigs
T02D1820:258b-33: la / phyag 'tshal bstod cing phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02D1820:258b-35: gus pas khyed la bdag gsol 'debs //
T02D1820:258b-36: rdo rje sems dpar bdag sgrubs shig / ces brjod la /
T02D1820:258b-37: aom sva bh'a wa shuddha: sarba dharm'a:/
T02D1820:258b-39: zhes bzlas nas chos thams cad stong pa nyid du mngon du byas te /
T02D1820:258b-40: aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a wa
T02D1820:258b-41: a'atma ko& ham zhes bya ba lan gsum brjod la
T02D1820:258b-42: / aom a'a: h'um badzra satva ma nu sma ras
T02D1820:258b-43: ma ye tishtha ae sha tv'am dh'a ra y'a mi
T02D1820:258b-44: badzra sa tva hi hi hi hi hi h'um zhes
T02D1820:259a-0: brjod nas bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpa' @259a *
T02D1820:259a-1: / // zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa sku mdog ston
T02D1820:259a-2: ka'i zla ba dangs ba ltar dkar zhing phyag na
T02D1820:259a-3: rdo rje dang dril bu bsnams pa ral pa'i thor
T02D1820:259a-4: tshugs can zhi zhing sgeg pa'i nyams dang ldan pa
T02D1820:259a-5: rang gi btsun mos mgul pa nas 'khyud pa sna
T02D1820:259a-6: tshogs padma dang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi gdan la
T02D1820:259a-7: sems dpa'i skyil krung gis bzhugs par bsgoms la /
T02D1820:259a-10: snying gar ni h'um zhes bya ba'i yi ge gsum dgod par bya'o //
T02D1820:259a-11: de nas aom sum bha ni sum bha h'um h'um phat /
T02D1820:259a-12: aom gri gna gri gna h'um h'um phat /
T02D1820:259a-13: aom gri hn'a pa ya gri hn'a pa ya h'um h'um phat /
T02D1820:259a-14: aom a'a na ya ho bha ga b'a na bidy'a r'a dza h'um h'um phat /
T02D1820:259a-16: phyogs bcur se gol gtogs pas phyogs skyong ba rnams gnod mdzes kyis bkug la /
T02D1820:259a-17: yang snying ga'i sa bon las spros pa'i bdud rtsi
T02D1820:259a-18: 'khyil pa'i phur bu sku stong khro bo'i gzugs can
T02D1820:259a-19: la 'og gi cha phur bu'i dbyibs can rnams spros
T02D1820:259a-20: te gnod mdzes kyis bkug pa'i bgegs rnams kyi spyi
T02D1820:259a-21: bor aom gha gha gh'a ta ya gh'a ta ya
T02D1820:259a-22: sarba dusht'am phat k'i la ya k'i la ya sarba
T02D1820:259a-23: p'a pam phat / h'um h'um h'um badzra k'i la
T02D1820:259a-24: ya badzra ra a'a dzny'a pa ya ti sarba bighn'am
T02D1820:259a-25: k'a ya b'a ka tsitta badzra k'i la ya h'um
T02D1820:259a-26: p'a pam phat / phat / ces bya ba mi g-yo bar byas la /
T02D1820:259a-27: aom badzra mungga ra badzra k'i la ya a'a ko ta ya h'um phat /
T02D1820:259a-28: ces bya bas 'dis rdo rje thob phyag na bsnams pa'i gnod mdzes kyis brdung bar bya'o //
T02D1820:259a-29: de nas phur bu'i 'od 'bar ba las 'og tu
T02D1820:259a-30: rdo rje'i sa gzhi steng du rdo rje'i dra ba
T02D1820:259a-31: / phyogs kun du rdo rje'i rab /
T02D1820:259a-32: phyi rol me ri 'bar bas bskor bar bsams la /
T02D1820:259a-33: h'um bzlas pa'i lci ba la sogs pa dang /
T02D1820:259a-34: sngar bstan pa'i chus aom badzra khe h'um zhes brjod cing mdun du mandala bya'o //
T02D1820:259a-35: mandala byug ba'i dus su mandala gyi phan yon kyang bzlas par bya ste /
T02D1820:259a-36: chu bcas lci ba sbyin pa ste //
T02D1820:259a-37: skyang nul byas pa tshul khrims yin //
T02D1820:259a-38: grog ma sogs bsal bzod yin te //
T02D1820:259a-39: bya ba spro ba brtson 'grus so //
T02D1820:259a-40: skad cig de sems rtse gcig pa //
T02D1820:259a-41: bsam gtan yin te ri mo dag / snyoms pa shes rab yin par gsungs //
T02D1820:259a-42: mandala byas pas pha rol phyin drug brnyes par 'gyur //
T02D1820:259a-43: lha mi khyad par can skye zla ltar gzi 'phags shing //
T02D1820:259a-44: nad kun las grol gser gyi mdog dang 'dra bar 'gyur //
T02D1820:259a-45: rgyal rigs 'bru dang gser sogs 'byor pas gang bar skye //
T02D1820:259b-0: des na bde gshegs mchog gi khyim du lus @259b las bya //
T02D1820:259b-2: de nas lag pa bkrus te mandala gyi dbus su
T02D1820:259b-3: lag pa bzhag la sa'i lha mo blos dmigs te
T02D1820:259b-5: skyob pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02D1820:259b-6: spyod pa'i tshul dang khyad par ni //
T02D1820:259b-7: sa dang pha rol phyin pa la //
T02D1820:259b-8: lha mo khyod ni dpar du gyur //
T02D1820:259b-9: sh'akya seng ge skyob pa yis //
T02D1820:259b-10: ji ltar bdud kyi stobs bcom pa //
T02D1820:259b-11: de bzhin bdag gis bdud las ni //
T02D1820:259b-12: rgyal bar byas te dkyil 'khor bri //
T02D1820:259b-13: aom me di n'i badzr'i bha ba badzra bandha h'um /
T02D1820:259b-14: zhes bya bas byin gyis brlabs la yid kyis sam
T02D1820:259b-15: lag pa'i me tog gis rim pa gsum dang ldan
T02D1820:259b-16: pa'i khang bu brtsegs pa bri'o //
T02D1820:259b-17: de nas rim pa dbus ma'i dbus su padma 'dab
T02D1820:259b-18: ma brgyad kyi lte ba la zla ba'i dkyil 'khor
T02D1820:259b-19: gyi steng du yi ge h'um bri'o //
T02D1820:259b-20: shar gyi cha'i padmar zla ba la aom lhor rin po che la sv'a /
T02D1820:259b-21: nub tu padma la a'a: byang du sna tshogs rdo rje la h'a /
T02D1820:259b-22: me'i mtshams la sogs pa rnams su ni mtshan ma
T02D1820:259b-23: de dag nyid dam zla ba la lam m'am pam
T02D1820:259b-24: t'am / rim pa gnyis pa'i me mtshams la sogs
T02D1820:259b-25: par gdan de dag nyid la ram sham gam ram
T02D1820:259b-26: t'am / / rim pa gsum pa snam bu'i shar
T02D1820:259b-27: la sogs pa'i ngos gnyis gnyis su gdan de dag
T02D1820:259b-28: t'am / / nyid mee thlhim / lhor aom aam /
T02D1820:259b-31: sgo rnams dang mtshams su nyi ma la gnas pa'i h'um bri'o //
T02D1820:259b-32: 'og gi cha shar gyi sgo sngon du'ang h'um ngo /
T02D1820:259b-33: steng gi cha nub kyi sgo sngon du yang nyi ma la gnas pa'i h'um ngo //
T02D1820:259b-34: de ltar sa bon rnams bris nas bgegs mthar byed kyi sngags bzlas pa'i chus bsang gtor byas te /
T02D1820:259b-35: mchod pa la yang bsang gtor lan gsum byas nas
T02D1820:259b-36: sa bon rnams 'od 'bar ba dang bcas par bsgom
T02D1820:259b-37: mo // de nas aom badzra pushpe a'a: h'um zhes bya ba'am /
T02D1820:259b-38: yi ge 'bru gsum bzlas pas me tog byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02D1820:259b-39: mchod pa'i rim pa ni 'di yin te /
T02D1820:259b-40: aom h'um badzra satva pushpam pra t'i tstsha sv'a h'a /
T02D1820:259b-41: aom aa dzin dzi ka pushpam pra t'i tstsha sv'a h'a /
T02D1820:259b-42: aom sv'a ratna dhri ka pushpam pra t'i tstsha sv'a h'a /
T02D1820:259b-43: aom a'a: a'a ro li ka pushpam pra t'i tstsha sv'a h'a /
T02D1820:259b-44: aom h'a pra dzny'a dhri ka pushpam pra t'i tstsha sv'a h'a /
T02D1820:259b-45: aom lam mo ha r'a ti pushpam pra t'i tstsha sv'a h'a /
T02D1820:259b-46: aom mam dve sha ra ti pushpam pra t'i tstsha sv'a h'a /
T02D1820:259b-47: aom pam r'a ga ra ti pushpam pra t'i tstsha sv'a h'a /
T02D1820:259b-48: aom t'am badzra ra ti pushpam pra t'i tstsha sv'a h'a /
T02D1820:259b-50: aom ram r'u pa badzra pushpam pra t'i tstsha sv'a h'a /
T02D1820:259b-51: aom shpam shapta badzra pushpam pra t'i tstsha sv'a h'a /
T02D1820:259b-52: aom gam gam gandha badzra pushpam pra t'i tstsha sv'a h'a /
T02D1820:260a-0: aom ram ra sa badzra pushpam @260a * //
T02D1820:260a-2: aom pam sparsha badzra pushpam pra t'i tstsha sv'a h'a /
T02D1820:260a-4: aom mee tri ya pushpam pra t'i tstsha sv'a h'a /
T02D1820:260a-5: aom thlhim kshi ti garbha pushpam pra t'i tstsha sv'a h'a /
T02D1820:260a-6: aom aom badzra p'a ni pushpam pra t'i tstsha sv'a h'a /
T02D1820:260a-7: aom aom kha garbha pushpam pra t'i tstsha sv'a h'a /
T02D1820:260a-8: aom aom lo ke shva ra pushpam pra t'i tstsha sv'a h'a /
T02D1820:260a-9: aom h'um manydzu gho sha pushpam pra t'i tstsha sv'a h'a /
T02D1820:260a-10: aom aom sarba ni ba ra ni bi skam bi ni pushpam pra t'i tstsha sv'a h'a /
T02D1820:260a-11: aom sam sa manta bha dra pushpam pra t'i tstsha sv'a h'a /
T02D1820:260a-12: aom h'um ya m'anta kri ta pushpam pra t'i tstsha sv'a h'a /
T02D1820:260a-13: aom h'um pra dzny'a nta kri ta pushpam pra t'i tstsha sv'a h'a /
T02D1820:260a-14: aom h'um padma nta kri ta pushpam pra t'i tstsha sv'a h'a /
T02D1820:260a-15: aom h'um bi ghn'a nta kri ta pushpam pra t'i tstsha sv'a h'a /
T02D1820:260a-16: aom h'um aa tsa la pushpam pra t'i tstsha sv'a h'a /
T02D1820:260a-17: aom h'um ta kki r'a dza pushpam pra t'i tstsha sv'a h'a /
T02D1820:260a-18: aom h'um n'i la da nda pushpam pra t'i tstsha sv'a h'a /
T02D1820:260a-19: aom h'um ma h'a ba la pushpam pra t'i tstsha sv'a h'a /
T02D1820:260a-20: aom h'um sumbha r'a dza pushpam pra t'i tstsha sv'a h'a /
T02D1820:260a-21: aom h'um au shn'i sha tsa kra warti pushpam pra t'i tstsha sv'a h'a /
T02D1820:260a-23: de ltar thams cad la sbyar bar bya ste /
T02D1820:260a-24: khyad par du ghandha pra t'i tstsha sv'a h'a /
T02D1820:260a-25: dhu pa pra t'i tstsha sv'a h'a /
T02D1820:260a-26: d'i pa pra t'i tstsha sv'a h'a /
T02D1820:260a-27: nee bi dya pra t'i tstsha sv'a h'a /
T02D1820:260a-28: zhes bya ba sbyar bar bya'o //
T02D1820:260a-29: de ltar mchod nas skad cig tsam gyis ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor bkug ste /
T02D1820:260a-31: h'um bam ho: zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor spyan drangs la bstims te /
T02D1820:260a-32: gnyis su med pa'i dkyil 'khor legs par bltas la /
T02D1820:260a-33: aom badzra satva aargham pra t'i tstsha sv'a h'a /
T02D1820:260a-35: aom badzra satva aanydza ma nam pra t'i tstsha sv'a h'a /
T02D1820:260a-36: de la aargham dang zhal bsil ni snod nyid kyis dbul lo //
T02D1820:260a-37: zhabs bskur ba ni khu tshur gyi sor mo bkrol ba rol pa dang bcas par dbul lo //
T02D1820:260a-38: yang zhal bsil me tog gam lag pas kyang dbul lo //
T02D1820:260a-39: de nas yang snga ma ltar rim pa bzhin du mchod la bskor ba lan gsum bya ste /
T02D1820:260a-40: aargha'i chu chu chu las bsang gtor byas la thal mo sbyar te //
T02D1820:260a-41: dkon mchog gsum la bdag skyabs mchi //
T02D1820:260a-42: sdig pa thams cad so sor bshags //
T02D1820:260a-43: 'gro ba'i dge la rjes yi rang //
T02D1820:260a-44: sangs rgyas byang chub yid kyis gzung //
T02D1820:260a-45: zhes lan gsum brjod la phyag lan gsum bya ste bstod pa 'dis bstod par bya'o //
T02D1820:260a-46: mi bskyod rdo rje ye shes che //
T02D1820:260a-47: rdo rje dbyings ni mkhas chen po //
T02D1820:260a-48: rdo rje gsum mchog dkyil 'khor gsum //
T02D1820:260a-49: gsang ba'i dbyings la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1820:260a-50: rnam par snang mdzad rab tu dag //
T02D1820:260a-51: rdo rje zhi ba dga' ba che //
T02D1820:260b-0: @260b rang bzhin gyis ni 'od gsal mchog //
T02D1820:260b-1: ston pa rdo rje phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02D1820:260b-2: rin chen rgyal po rab tu zab //
T02D1820:260b-3: rdo rje nam mkha' dri ma med //
T02D1820:260b-4: dngos nyid dag pas gos pa med //
T02D1820:260b-5: gsang ba'i gsung la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1820:260b-7: mi rtog nam mkha' rdo rje 'dzin //
T02D1820:260b-8: 'dod chags pha rol phyin brnyes pa //
T02D1820:260b-9: rdo rje gsung la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1820:260b-10: rdo rje dag pa gdon mi za //
T02D1820:260b-11: bsam pa thams cad yongs rdzogs pa //
T02D1820:260b-12: sangs rgyas ngo bo nyid las byung //
T02D1820:260b-13: rdo rje sems dpa' phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1820:260b-14: zhes pa'i tshigs su bcad pa lngas bstod la /
T02D1820:260b-15: yi ge gsum po ci nus kyis mi g-yeng bas bzlas brjod bya'o //
T02D1820:260b-16: de nas aom a'a: h'um bam ho: zhes bya ba
T02D1820:260b-17: 'dis ye shes kyi 'khor lo rang gi lus la
T02D1820:260b-18: bsdus la rim pa 'dis sku gsung thugs byin gyis
T02D1820:260b-19: brlab bo // de la spyi bor zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du aom dkar po bsgoms la /
T02D1820:260b-20: dpal ldan sangs rgyas sku 'dzin pa //
T02D1820:260b-21: rdo rje mi phyed gsum gyi dngos //
T02D1820:260b-22: deng bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i gnas //
T02D1820:260b-23: rdo rje skur ni mdzad du gsol //
T02D1820:260b-24: phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams //
T02D1820:260b-25: rdo rje mi phyed gsum gyi dngos //
T02D1820:260b-26: deng bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i gnas //
T02D1820:260b-27: rdo rje skur ni mdzad du gsol //
T02D1820:260b-28: sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku gang yin //
T02D1820:260b-29: phung po lnga yis rab gang ba //
T02D1820:260b-30: sangs rgyas sku yi ngo bo yis //
T02D1820:260b-31: bdag kyang de dang 'drar gyur cig / aom sarba
T02D1820:260b-32: ta th'a ga ta k'a ya badzra sv'a bh'a wa
T02D1820:260b-33: a'atma ko& ham / de'i rjes la mgrin par padma'i steng du a'a: dmar po bsgoms la /
T02D1820:260b-34: chos kyi gsung lam dpal dang ldan //
T02D1820:260b-35: rdo rje mi phyed gsum gyi dngos //
T02D1820:260b-36: deng bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i gnas //
T02D1820:260b-37: rdo rje'i gsung du mdzad du gsol //
T02D1820:260b-38: phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams //
T02D1820:260b-39: rdo rje mi phyed gsum gyi dngos //
T02D1820:260b-40: deng bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i gnas //
T02D1820:260b-41: rdo rje gsung du mdzad du gsol //
T02D1820:260b-42: rdo rje chos kyi gsung gang yin //
T02D1820:260b-43: gsung de nges tshig phun sum tshogs //
T02D1820:260b-44: bdag gi tshig kyang de 'dra bar //
T02D1820:260b-45: chos 'dzin pa dang mtshungs par shog / aom sarba
T02D1820:260b-46: ta th'a ga ta w'a ka badzra satva ba a'atma
T02D1820:260b-47: ko& ham / de nas snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la h'um sngon po bsgoms la //
T02D1820:260b-48: rdo rje thugs 'dzin dpal dang ldan //
T02D1820:260b-49: rdo rje mi phyed gsum gyi dngos //
T02D1820:260b-50: deng bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i gnas //
T02D1820:261a-2: phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams //
T02D1820:261a-3: rdo rje mi phyed gsum gyi dngos //
T02D1820:261a-4: deng bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i gnas //
T02D1820:261a-5: rdo rje thugs su mdzad du gsol //
T02D1820:261a-6: kun du bzang po'i thugs gang yin //
T02D1820:261a-7: gsang pa'i bdag po blo ldan pa / bdag gi sems kyang de 'dra bar //
T02D1820:261a-8: rdo rje 'dzin na dang mtshungs par shog / aom
T02D1820:261a-9: sarba ta th'a ga ta tsi tta bzra sva bh'a
T02D1820:261a-11: yang thams cad du lhag par mos par byas la /
T02D1820:261a-12: aom sarba shr'a ga ta k'a ya lw'a ka tsi tta badzra sva tma ko nya h'um /
T02D1820:261a-14: de ltar bdag nyid byin gyis brlab nas /
T02D1820:261a-15: slar yang yi ge brgya bas brtan par bya ste /
T02D1820:261a-18: badzras tva tve no pa ti shtha dho me bha wa /
T02D1820:261a-19: su to shyo me bha wa /
T02D1820:261a-20: aa nu ra kto me bha wa /
T02D1820:261a-21: sarba si ddhi mme pra ytstsha /
T02D1820:261a-22: sarba ka rma su ci mi tsi ttam shre ya: ku ru h'um /
T02D1820:261a-24: bha ga w'a na srba th'a ga ta badzra m'a
T02D1820:261a-25: me mu nytsa bi dzr'a bha ba ma h'a sa
T02D1820:261a-27: de nas aa rgha'i chus mandala la bsang gtor lan
T02D1820:261a-28: gsum byas te yang chu gtor la mandala gyi thog
T02D1820:261a-30: khyed kyis sems can don kun mdzad //
T02D1820:261a-31: rjes su mthun pa'i dngos grub gsol //
T02D1820:261a-32: sangs rgyas yul du gshegs nas su //
T02D1820:261a-33: slar yang 'byon par mdzad du gsol //
T02D1820:261a-34: mu: zhes bya pas gshegs su gsol la /
T02D1820:261a-35: de nas me tog la sogs pa bsal te /
T02D1820:261a-36: yang legs par byugs la me tog gcig phul te
T02D1820:261a-37: bzod par mdzod cig ces brjod la langs te ji
T02D1820:261a-39: thun mtshams gzhan la yang de ltar byas te zla
T02D1820:261a-40: ba gcig ma lo phyed dam lo gcig tu chog
T02D1820:261a-41: des rdo rje sems dpa' mnyes par byas na ji
T02D1820:261a-42: ltar 'dod pa'i dngos grub kyi mtshan ma 'byung bar
T02D1820:261a-43: 'gyur ro // de nas rgyud nas gsungs pa bzhin du bsgrub par bya'o //
T02D1820:261a-44: dus gsum rgyal ba'i rang bzhin kun gyi gtso //
T02D1820:261a-45: ye shes sku mchog rdo rje sems dpa' yi //
T02D1820:261a-46: mchod pa'i cho ga bdag gis byas pa des //
T02D1820:261a-47: phyag rgya chen po'i go 'phang thob par shog //
T02D1820:261a-48: rdo rje sems dpa' mchod pa'i chog /
T02D1820:261a-49: slob dpon chen po nag po pa'i zhal snga nas
T02D1820:261a-50: bla ma'i man ngag las bzung ste mdzad pa rdzogs
T02D1820:261a-52: / rgya gar gyi mkhan po slob dpon nag po pa'i zhal snga nas /
